name: Bulby - Diamond Course
description: Bulby - Diamond Course is a colorful 3D Platformer inspired by a classic old 16-bit game. Bulby features tons of levels in Story Mode, Coop, Multiplayer, and a built-in Course Editor to create your own courses and share with the internet.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics Storage: 800 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Win 7, Win 8, Win 8.1, Win 10 Processor: Intel i5 2nd Gen Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Gtx 550 Storage: 2 GB available space
